titles.title: When we all get to heaven

authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt & Emily D. Wilson
Eliza E. Hewitt & Emily D. Wilson

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing the wondrous love of Jesus, Sing His mercy and His grace;
In the mansions bright and blessed, He'll prepare for us a place.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
When we all get to heaven, What a day of rejoicing that will be;
When we all see Jesus, We'll sing and shout the victory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
While we walk the pilgrim pathway, Clouds will over spread the sky;
But when travelling days are over, Not a shadow, not a sigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us then be true and faithful, Trusting serving everyday;
Just one glimpse of Him in glory, Will the toils of life repay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Onward to the prize before us, Soon His beauty we'll behold;
Soon the pearly gates will open, We shall tread the streets of gold.
